title: New: Camp Counselors – Roman Blankets / City Streets
content:
So as with many of the artists I write about, I have no clue whatsoever who the musician(s) behind Buffalo’s Camp Counselors are, all I know is that their two debut tracks are pretty special.

Lo-fi synth led numbers, the five and a half minute epic that is Roman Blankets is remorseful, overflowing with longing and youthful lust whilst City Streets is a more 80’s darkwave inspired track, with a far more defined chorus. If I had to hazard a guess, I’d say Camp Counselors is a solo-outfit, most noticeably in the electronic percussion sections, however I could well be wrong, either way, they’re two thoroughly fantastic tracks. Check out both tracks below and grab a free download if it’s your sort of thing.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
